name: The Sims
description: REQUIRES a NoCD executable. Please download it before continuing. Uses dgvoodoo Graphics Api Wrapper by Dege. Official website http://dege.fw.hu
notes: - Please set up Vulkan first. Click here for a how-to guide - Ignore the message about lacking memory, just press Yes and continue. - Don't press "Play" after the setup of the game has finished. Just wait for the installer to finish. - This installer has only been tested with Complete Collection and Deluxe Edition, but other versions should work too. - NoCD executable for Deluxe Edition (you need unrar to get it extracted): http://www.gameburnworld.com/gp/gamefixes/simsdeluxeedition.shtml - NoCD executable for Complete Collection (you need unrar get it extracted): http://www.gameburnworld.com/gp/gamefixes/simscompletecollection.shtml

files.installer: N/A:Select the Setup executable (Setup.exe in Setup folder, NOT start.exe):

content:
files:
- dgvoodoo: https://lutris.net/files/tools/dgvoodoo_2.55.4_dx1-7.tar.xz
- nocd: 'N/A:Select the NoCD executable (Sims.exe):'
- installer: 'N/A:Select the Setup executable (Setup.exe in Setup folder, NOT start.exe):'
game:
  arch: win32
  args: -r1024x768 -skip_intro -skip_verify
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Maxis/The Sims/Sims.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Maxis/The Sims/
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating prefix
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Sims.exe
    src: nocd
- execute:
    command: chmod 770 "$GAMEDIR/Sims.exe"
    description: Changing permissions...
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43 d3dcompiler_47 quartz
    arch: win32
    description: Installing d3dcompiler_43 and d3dcompiler_47...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing The Sims...
    exclude_processes: Start.exe start.exe
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Maxis/The Sims/
    src: $GAMEDIR/Sims.exe
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Maxis/The Sims/
    file: dgvoodoo
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Maxis/The Sims/dgVoodoo.conf
    key: dgVoodooWatermark
    section: DirectX
    value: false
wine:
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    ddraw: native
    winegstreamer: disabled
